pkgmetadata.longdescription: Amplitude Python SDK--------------------SDK for Amplitude API | SDK for Amplitude API. | https://developers.amplitude.com/docs | https://github.com/paulokuong/amplitudeRequirements------------- Python 3.7.0Goal----| To provide a python API client for Amplitude API.| (More clients to be implemented)Code sample-----------| Requesting Behavioral Cohorts API.. code:: python from amplitude_sdk import BehavioralCohortsClient b = BehavioralCohortsClient( api_key='xxxxxxx', secret='yyyyyyyy') b.list_cohorts()Contributors------------- Paulo Kuong (`@paulokuong`).. @pkuong: https://github.com/paulokuong
